original_text:
You have put me in the depths of the pit,
    in the regions dark and deep.
korean_text: 주께서 나를 깊은 웅덩이와 어둡고 음침한 곳에 두셨사오며

sentences.original_text: You have put me in the depths of the pit
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 나를 깊은 구렁 속에 두셨습니다

sentences.original_text: in the regions dark and deep
